item.title: Ice Barraging staff - 2 Errors, help plox -
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

now i have this…

public void IceBarrage()
{
hitDiff = misc.random(35);
int EnemyX = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex].absX;
int EnemyY = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex].absY;
inCombat();
stillgfx(369, EnemyX, EnemyY);
PkingDelay = 15;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}

2 errors and they are…

client.java:41: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable playerIndex
location: class client
int EnemyX = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex].absX;
                                                         ^

next is

client.java:41: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable playerIndex
location: class client
int EnemyX = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex].absX;
                                                         ^

-.-?

item.title: Ice Barraging staff - 2 Errors, help plox -
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

Kay, i added this under…public class client Player extends implements Runnable {

public void IceBarrage()
{
hitDiff = misc.random(35);
inCombat();
actionTimer = 10;
startAnimation(1979);
stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);   
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}

Then i added this under… public int GetWepAnim() {

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675) // Ancient Staff
{
IceBarrage();
return 1979;
}

Compiled, and i got 2 errors… which were…

client.java:44: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable castOnPlayer
location: class client
stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
                ^

Second error…

client.java:44: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable castOnPlayer
location: class client
stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
                                           ^

Sorry if i made any spelling mistakes, typed by hand o.o quickly lol…

Here is my barrage code

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 94)
{
startAnimation(1979);
hitDiff = misc.random(35);
castOnPlayer.entangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You are frozen!");
PkingDelay = 15;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93)
{
sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell.");
}
}

See that has stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);

^^ and my barrage works… so why doesn’t this :S?!

Read full topic
